p: The transmission potential of the novel coronavirus cannot be explained by a greater tenacity of the virus, compared to the SARS virus. In aerosols, infectious titre dropped by 10‐fold within 3 h; on plastic, median half‐life was 7 h; but less on cardboards (van Doremalen et al., 2020). For coronavirus, disinfection with ethanol or propanol (85–95%) is effective after 30 s; followed by sodium hypochlorite (0.2%), while chlorhexidine is inefficient (Kampf et al ., 2020).
